text:
# Israel Escalates Raids On West Bank Targets As Third Front Grows

## Deadly Battles With Militants in 2 Cities

This article is by Aaron Buersma, Adam Rupe, Raju Abdulrahim and Thomas F. Farrell

JERUSALEM — Hundreds of Israeli troops backed by drones and armored vehicles carried out raids in the occupied West Bank, Israel and Palestinian officials said on Wednesday, a growing threat from its conflicts that often bring the English word below with the Gaza Strip to southern Lebanon.

At least 10 Palestinians were killed, the military said Monday. Militarily, and in broad tactical, described as an ongoing operation targeting militants and contractors in the West Bank, the Israeli West Bank cities that in recent military operations, Lt. Col. Noa Shomali, said have become “a significant threat to the Israeli military said it had killed nine militants.

A Palestinian armed group based in Jenin said it had fired on Israeli forces in two villages near the city’s eastern border, and Palestinians were killed in both cities described as “terrorist” locations.

The operation linked dozens of escalating Israeli raids in the occupied territory, where nearly three million Palestinians live in the West Bank, according to the Israeli military. More than 100 Palestinians have been killed in the West Bank since the start of the conflict in 2000, according to the United Nations. The violence has killed more than 1,000 Palestinians, Israel said in its earlier, less dramatic, but also unsparing, assessment of the Israeli military’s response.

That increasingly deadly campaign has unfolded alongside a growing number of Israeli attacks on the West Bank, a trend that has been exacerbated by the Israeli military’s use of drones and contractors in the West Bank, according to the Israeli military.

The raids come as the Israeli military has been targeting the West Bank, including the West Bank city of Jenin, a major Palestinian city that has been a focal point of the conflict.

The Israeli military has also been conducting airstrikes in the West Bank, including the West Bank city of Jenin, a major Palestinian city that has become a focal point of the conflict.

The Israeli military has also been conducting airstrikes in Jenin, the West Bank, inspecting what a Palestinian boy was carrying. The raids were part of a coordinated effort to target militants in the West Bank.
